title._content: [Private Silas A. Shirley of Co. H, 16th Mississippi Infantry Regiment, with books and sign reading Victory or Death!]  (LOC)

description._content: [Private Silas A. Shirley of Co. H, 16th Mississippi Infantry Regiment, with books and sign reading Victory or Death!] [between 1861 and 1864] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather; central oval and scroll design. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Photo shows identified soldier. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2013; (D066) Purchased from: Matthew Fleming, Milan, Ohio, 2012. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Subjects: Shirley, Silas A.,--approximately 1840-1864. Confederate States of America.--Army.--Mississippi Infantry Regiment, 16th--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Signs (Notices)--1860-1870. Books--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.34986 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 3077
